thread.title: South Carolina coach Steve Spurrier to retire
thread.title_full: South Carolina coach Steve Spurrier to retire

author: Rodney Harris
title: South Carolina coach Steve Spurrier to retire
text:
South Carolina coach Steve Spurrier to retire Posted: 
South Carolina head football coach Steve Spurrier is retiring, according to SI.com 
Follow the latest developments tonight on CBS46 News at 11.
